name: GKInviteRecipientResponse
desc: A player’s response to an invitation to join a match.

items.name: case accepted
items.desc: A response when the player accepts the invitation.

items.name: case declined
items.desc: A response when the player rejects the invitation.

items.name: case failed
items.desc: A response when the system fails to deliver the invitation to the player.

items.name: case incompatible
items.desc: A response when the player isn’t running a compatible version of the game.

items.name: case unableToConnect
items.desc: A response when the system can’t contact the player.

items.name: case noAnswer
items.desc: A response when the invitation times out because the player doesn’t answer it.

items.name: static var inviteeResponseFailed: GKInviteRecipientResponse
items.desc: The invitation was unable to be delivered.

items.name: static var inviteeResponseIncompatible: GKInviteRecipientResponse
items.desc: The invitee isn’t running a compatible version of your game.

items.name: static var inviteeResponseNoAnswer: GKInviteRecipientResponse
items.desc: The invitation timed out without an answer.
